item.title: Data Backup
item.description: the 3-to-1 rule: have 3 copies of data stored on 2 different storages and have 1 copy kept offsite.

item.title: Remote Connection Managers on Windows
item.description: mRemoteNG mRemoteNG is an open source multi-protocol remote connection manager for Windows.

item.title: iptraf
item.description: github.com/iptraf-ng/iptraf-ng iptraf -s <interface> # monitor TCP and UDP traffic on the specified interface, group by port.

item.title: Docker stdout and stderr output
item.description: When you run docker exec or docker run with the -t flag, stdout and stderr are indistinguishable and not suitable for redirections.
